Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: DuplicateModuleFunctionError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: A duplicate ModuleFunction has been defined.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ModuleFunctionRegistrationError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: A failure registering a module function.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ModuleEventPushError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: An error pushing Module Event to Drive.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ModuleFunctionArgumentError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: The argument passed to a Module Function is incorrect.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: InvalidCallError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: There’s an issue with the API call. A common issue is that Drive has changed and the previous call request became orphaned.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ApiCallTimeoutError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: An API call to Drive has timed out.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: JsIssuedError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: An API call to the Drive failed at the Javascript layer.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ModuleFunctionNotFoundError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: A Module Function was not found.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: ScheduleNotificationError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Local Notification module failed scheduling a notification.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: NotificationNotFound
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: The notification is not found in the current context.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: NoImageFileAvailableError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: The underlying device/resource for Image Picker is not available.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: CaptureImageError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Something went wrong with the capture image request.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: FileException(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: An exception has occured related to a file operation.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: GeolocationError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Geolocation error.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: AppModuleError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to the App Module

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: BrowserModuleError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to Browser Module.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: MotionActivityError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to Motion activity module

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: IoxBleError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to IOX BLE module.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: IoxEventParsingError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to IOX Data Parsing.

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: StorageModuleError(error:)
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Error related to Local Storage Module

Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.name: InvalidObjectError
Enums/GeotabDriveErrors.html#/s:15Geotab.abstract: Indicates a required object is invalid or has been released from memory

Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: functions
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: Functions that reside in this module’s in Javascript namespace.

Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: findFunction(name:)
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: Returns the module function with the given name or nil if not found.

Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.name: scripts()
Classes/Module.html#/s:15GeotabMobileSDK.abstract: Javascript snippets to be injected into the WKWebview instance for communicating with this Module and its contained ModuleFunctions. Add any scripts generated by a super method.

Classes/MyGeotabSdkConfig.html#/s:15Geot.name: serverAddress
Classes/MyGeotabSdkConfig.html#/s:15Geot.abstract: The server address to launch MyGeotab from

Classes/DriveSdkConfig.html#/s:15GeotabM.name: serverAddress
Classes/DriveSdkConfig.html#/s:15GeotabM.abstract: The server address to launch Geotab Drive from.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: isCharging
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Indicates whether the device is in charging state.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: cancelLogin()
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Cancels a login request. When a user selects Add CoDriver in Drive, but does not to proceed to login, this function must be called. This function will navigate Drive to the most recent non-login page. If the login request is for a main driver , calling this function will dismiss the DriveViewController.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setSpeechEngine(speechEngine:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a custom speech Engine to replace the default one comes with the SDK.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setSession(credentialResult:isCoDriver:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a new Geotab session for driver or co-driver. Setting a new session means adding a new driver to Drive. In case the given session is invalid, Login Required event will be triggered. See setLoginRequiredCallback for more detail.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setCustomURLPath(path:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set navigation path. “path” will be concatenated as follows: “https:///drive/default.html?#${path}”.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setDriverActionNecessaryCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set DriverActionNecessary callback to listen for such event sent from Web Drive.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setLoginRequiredCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set a callback to listen for session changes. That includes: no session, invalid session, session expired, co-driver login is requested.

Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.name: setLastServerAddressUpdatedCallback(_:)
Classes/DriveViewController.html#/s:15Ge.abstract: Set LastServerAddressUpdated callback listener. Such event is sent by Drive to notify impelementor that a designated “server address” should be used for future launches. Implementor should save the new server address in persistent storage. In the future launches, app should set the DriveSdkConfig.serverAddress with the stored new address before creating an instance of DriveViewController. Note such address is not the same as the counterparty one in MyGeotabViewController.

Classes/DriveViewController.html.name: DriveViewController
Classes/DriveViewController.html.abstract: Drive’s View Controller and API interface. Everthing you need to launch a Drive. Only one instance should be created.

Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html.name: MyGeotabViewController
Classes/MyGeotabViewController.html.abstract: MyGeotab’s View Controller and API interface. Everthing you need to launch a MyGeotab. Only one instance should be created.

Classes/ModuleFunction.html.name: ModuleFunction
Classes/ModuleFunction.html.abstract: Defines a function to be included in a Geotab module’s Javascript API. Intended for internal Drive and MyGeotab use.

Typealiases.html.name: Type Aliases
Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
